roleset.name: think
roleset.note: MULL-V NOTES: Frames file for 'mull' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No access to verbnet. Comparison with 'think'. (from mull.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: thought as NP
example.text: While many problems would attend a restructuring of Columbia, investors say Mr. Spiegel is mulling such a plan to mitigate Columbia's junk problems.
example.arg: such a plan to mitigate Columbia's junk problems

example.name: thought as PP
example.text: John was mulling over his recent losses in the school sandbox.
example.arg: over his recent losses in the school sandbox

roleset.name: simmer with spices
roleset.note: MULL-V NOTES: Frames file for 'mull' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No access to verbnet. Comparison with 'think'. (from mull.02-v predicate notes)

example.name: yum
example.text: Mary mulled a magnum of wine, then drank it all.
